title: Boston Takes Charge, Key Playoff Injuries
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss Boston’s transformation from the start of the season, the squad’s sensational defense on Kevin Durant, Booker & Middleton’s injuries and Joel Embiid making a statement in Toronto.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Boston's Sensation Defense On Durant & Kyrie, Embiid Makes A Statement
